meta.title: Equip and Empower with Christine Caine
meta.description:
We live in a world that whispers that you’re not enough. That you are defeated. That you are disqualified because of your past. These lies are everywhere, everyday. You read about them, hear about them, and interact with them. 
 
But Christine Caine is here to speak above that noise with the truth of how God sees you, and who he’s created you to be, so you can make his name famous! She will equip and empower you to create change in this world and live out your God given destiny!

If you desire to bring hope, create change, and see yourself the way God sees you, this podcast is for you. Every Monday and Thursday we will dive into Scripture together and get inspired with the passion and truth we need to step boldly into the destiny God has for us.
meta.subtitle:

meta.author: AccessMore
meta.summary:
We live in a world that whispers that you’re not enough. That you are defeated. That you are disqualified because of your past. These lies are everywhere, everyday. You read about them, hear about them, and interact with them. 
 
But Christine Caine is here to speak above that noise with the truth of how God sees you, and who he’s created you to be, so you can make his name famous! She will equip and empower you to create change in this world and live out your God given destiny!

If you desire to bring hope, create change, and see yourself the way God sees you, this podcast is for you. Every Monday and Thursday we will dive into Scripture together and get inspired with the passion and truth we need to step boldly into the destiny God has for us.

episodes.title: Ep 01: An Abundant Life
episodes.description:
Jesus came to give us an abundant life and he wants us to live it! He wants us to live a life filled with passion! Passion is being steadfast and integrous. It comes from who’s in you—God—and his flowing out of you to the world around you. If your life has grown dull, predictable, and full of nothing but routine, or if it is feeling small, this episode will show you how to rediscover the life God put on the inside of you — and how to live it! 

To get a copy of this teaching, learn how to stay connected with Christine throughout the week, or to sign up to receive daily encouragement, check out the show notes at ChristineCaine.com/Podcast.

But Christine Caine is here to speak above that noise with the truth of how God sees you, and who he’s created you to be, so you can make his name famous!
